titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: This resolution elects designated Members of the House of Representatives to the Committee on Agriculture, the Committee on Armed Services, the Committee on Ethics, the Committee on Homeland Security, the Committee on Natural Resources, the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
